attributes.action: justify his statement that cannabis has a lethal quality and explain beyond media hype its current illegality (ideally with referenced statistics)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk_politics/7372876.stm

Cannabis is rarely a directly attributable factor in any recorded fatality, as opposed to alcohol which kills tens-of-thousands of people a year. I petition the Prime Minister to explain his stance on the classification of cannabis and clarify his views on the Government's policy regarding its use, beyond the linked media hype, before the next election.
